name: Enel
summary: Enel SpA operates as an integrated operator in electricity and gas industries worldwide. It operates through Thermal Generation and Trading; Enel Green Power; Enel Grids; and End-user Markets segments. The company operates renewable, nuclear, wind, hydroelectric, thermal, solar, and geothermal power plants. It also generates, distributes, transmits, and sells electricity. In addition, the company is involved in development and commercialization of electric mobility solutions; retail and wholesale commercialization of natural gas; and trading and services. Further, it provides technological solutions, such as transport, property management, as well as industrial processes and services, charging infrastructures for electric vehicles, energy efficiency in industrial and domestic processes, distributed generation, energy consultancy services, smart street lighting, and circular cities. Additionally, the company engages in the sale of energy commodities. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Rome, Italy.
